title: Hellboy, Vol. 11: The Bride of Hell and Others
description: The world's greatest paranormal investigator takes on a carnivorous house, space aliens, a vampire luchador, a vengeful lion demon, and more in this collection featuring the work of comic greats Mike Mignola, Richard Corben, Kevin Nowlan, and Scott Hampton.Collects Hellboy in Mexico; Double Feature of Evil; The Sleeping and the Dead #1â€“2; The Bride of Hell; The Whittier Legacy; Buster Oakley Gets His Wish.
author: Mike Mignola
